header.title: Whoopi Goldberg Calls New Progressive Legislators Sexist and Ageist
header.subtitle: NA
header.postText: Multistreaming with https://restream.io/. . Woopie Golberg attacks new progressives who do not want to support Nancy Pelosi and Diane Feinstein. . Support the show here:. https://www.patreon.com/micasaessucasa/. https://www.paypal.me/NikoHouse. . Or Cash App (Preferred one-time donation method). . https://cash.me/$NikoDHouse. . Join MCSC on JustNForm:. https://justnform.com/members/mcsc/. . Follow on Twitter:. . https://twitter.com/nikoCSFB. https://twitter.com/mcsc. . Like on Facebook:. . https://facebook.com/nikoforthepeople

commentThread.commentText: Whoopi is a sell out for money and real psychopath. Has sold herself to money and the devil period! How much do you make promoting this BS? Wow, Justice Democrats are crazy? She is totally stupid!

You would think one of her producers would have schooled her on this issue, before she came out and spoke wrongfully, about the Justice Democrats! You know Nancy Pelosi is the wrong person for the job when Trump even wants her to be the speaker! That is saying a whole lot!

replies.commentText: And I'm so ageist, sexist, and racist that I too will vote for Bernie, also voted for Jill, and want Nina Turner for Bernie's VP in 2020 and POTUS in 2024.
flashfloodarea3 i love nina turner too. im hoping she'll go in if bernie wants to pass on 2020.

@commentor Yes, I see some people squealing over the idea of Richard Ojeda debating Trump onstage, but can you imagine Nina Turner debating Trump? That'd be a whole different ball game. I just wish she had more name recognition to do a 2020 run. I kinda think that's necessary when up against Trump's universal recognition. Too bad she didn't win her last race for office, but neither did Ojeda. I can't see why anyone would be more excited over Ojeda, a total newbie, than Nina Turner - except thst he's white, male, and a Marine.

I don't object to Nancy because she's old, I object to her, among other reasons, because she's senile. " Let's hear it for more pre-existing medical conditions! " "Yay!" The senile leading the stupid. If she ever steps foot in our district we aren't aware of it. She doesn't even say she's a San Franciscan anymore. The ACA money came with strings that are unraveling our relatively excellent public health system. She's a monster.

Her generation started it, or at least kept it going for us to deal with, they never expected to be identified as part of the problem. Their action in the face of inaction, on their part, is not something that deserves a thank you, let alone credit for getting us to fight for ourselves. We got stronger in spite of their work.
Does Whoopi really believe what she says?.. A progressive should inform her..

replies.commentText: Shawna Fetzer the reason is that this is a live stream video. If you'd like to catch it live, you can turn on the notification bell. Otherwise, the edited version takes several hours to update. Thanks for tuning in.
